alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 4:15AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Craven and central Carteret Counties through 445 AM EST... At 415 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Merrimon to near Harlowe to near Pine Knoll Shores. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Harkers Island, South River, North River, Merrimon, Marshallberg, Davis, Straits, Smyrna, Harlowe, Otway, Williston, Great Neck, Open Grounds Farm, Stacy, Bettie, Michael J Smith Airport, Oceana Pier, Rachel Carson Estuarine Reserve and Fort Macon State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
